name: Core-Zero
tagline: A sentient modpack with lots of mod and is very unstable. Did I mention it's sentient?
body: Core Zero is the ultimate modded Minecraft experience, and it can fall apart and blow up any minute. This is a modpack so unpredictable, so bleeding edge, so fun that it might just escape your comprehension. Yeah, it does that.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
